results.title: Metformin Prevents Low-dose Isoproterenol-induced Cardiac Dilatation and Systolic Dysfunction in Male Sprague Dawley Rats.
results.text_hl: ISO: 28.1 +- 2.9; P = 0.05) were produced by ISO administration, effects prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ offers cardiac protection against chronic sympathetic-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@LV dilatation@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@systolic dysfunction@@@.

citations.NLM: Peterson VR, Norton GR, Madziva MT, Makaula S. Metformin Prevents Low-dose Isoproterenol-induced Cardiac Dilatation and Systolic Dysfunction in Male Sprague Dawley Rats. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2022 Mar 1;79(3):289-295. PMID: 34775423

results.title: Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ partially reversed the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular dilatation@@@ (reverse remodeling) and significantly improved cardiac function.

citations.NLM: Kanamori H, Naruse G, Yoshida A, Minatoguchi S, Watanabe T, Kawaguchi T, Yamada Y, Mikami A, Kawasaki M, Takemura G, Minatoguchi S. Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy. Circ Heart Fail. 2019 Apr;12(4):e005418. PMID: 30922066
citations.BibTeX: @article{30922066, title={Metformin Enhances Autophagy and Provides Cardioprotection in delta-Sarcoglycan Deficiency-Induced Dilated Cardiomyopathy.}, author={Kanamori H and Naruse G and Yoshida A and Minatoguchi S and Watanabe T and Kawaguchi T and Yamada Y and Mikami A and Kawasaki M and Takemura G and Minatoguchi S}, journal={Circ Heart Fail}, volume={12}, number={4}, pages={e005418}}

results.title: Metformin improves cardiac function in a nondiabetic rat model of post-MI heart failure.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ resulted in less @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular dilatation@@@ (6.0 +- 0.4 vs. 7.6 +- 0.6 mm, P < 0.05) and preservation of left ventricular ejection fraction (65.8 +- 3.7% vs. 48.6 +- 5.6%, P < 0.05) compared with MI control.

citations.NLM: Yin M, van der Horst IC, van Melle JP, Qian C, van Gilst WH, Silljé HH, de Boer RA. Metformin improves cardiac function in a nondiabetic rat model of post-MI heart failure. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2011 Aug;301(2):H459-68. PMID: 21572014
citations.BibTeX: @article{21572014, title={Metformin improves cardiac function in a nondiabetic rat model of post-MI heart failure.}, author={Yin M and van der Horst IC and van Melle JP and Qian C and van Gilst WH and Silljé HH and de Boer RA}, journal={Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol}, volume={301}, number={2}, pages={H459-68}}
